mapper.insert: insert into membership_user( user_id, is_membership, membership_name, membership_expired_time, update_time, create_time, is_deleted )values( #{membershipUser.userId}, #{membershipUser.isMembership}, #{membershipUser.membershipName}, #{membershipUser.membershipExpiredTime}, #{membershipUser.updateTime}, #{membershipUser.createTime}, #{membershipUser.isDeleted} )
